content.question:
The diagram below shows various points on three aggregate demand <math alttext="A D " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>(AD)</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> curves.

A decrease in the price level will produce a movement between which of the following two points on the diagram above?

choices.label: From point X to point Y
From point W to point Y
From point W to point Z
From point Z to point Y
From point Y to point Z

content.answer: From point Y to point Z

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
